channel.title: 2021-07-27 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2021-07-27 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 27 Jul 2021 00:00
item.description: Got around setting up my music collection on the odroid-xu4 using Navidrome. With that streamlined, I can now listen to the same collection over any connected device and/or cache the songs for offline listening using dsub! Feels like a self-hosted Spotify!
item.content:encoded: Got around setting up my music collection on the odroid-xu4 using Navidrome. With that streamlined, I can now listen to the same collection over any connected device and/or cache the songs for offline listening using dsub! Feels like a self-hosted Spotify!
